text: Hello!  I created an email for a client and then sent previews to me, the client, and one of my fellow employees. I sent 4 preview emails to me, and they were all as designed.  However, the client and my fellow employee both received emails that were missing  2 small column sections.  Those sections had a background image, which I know can be blocked, especially by Outlook.  I'm wondering why I was able to receive them as designed but the others did not.  Are there any quick insights into what happened? Thanks!
We would need to know what email applications everyone used to view the emails.
And then you can do an Inbox Preview in HubSpot to look at those email clients.
